lead_paragraph: I am in residency to become a plastic surgeon. Part of the training for that branch of medicine is in hand surgery. I once had a professor who said that you can tell a lot about a person by the type of hand injury they suffer. My work at a Los Angeles County hospital has given me a fresh perspective on California's Proposition 187, the measure that, if it survives in court, would limit non-emergency medical treatment to illegal aliens, among other things.
